medical_history.chief_complaint: Referral for genetic testing due to a family history of Fragile X syndrome.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient achieved early developmental milestones late, specifically walking at approximately 2 years of age. Normal prenatal and postnatal development was noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No medical complications during prenatal and postnatal periods; walking delay at approximately 2 years.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother is a premutation carrier of Fragile X syndrome; the younger brother diagnosed at 6 years with full features of Fragile X syndrome.
